oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-06-18 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 18, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Roy Drusky, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Hank Garland, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1080th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Ferlin Husky; Roy Drusky; Del Wood; Ferlin Husky; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ferlin Husky introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ferlin Husky) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Roy Drusky -- Another (Roy Drusky, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Varsity Trot (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky announce his tour schedule -- What Good Will I Ever Be (Ferlin Husky, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Selph, Jimmy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Husky, Ferlin; Drusky, Roy
